about_the_game:
New Pilot Attire is here to
jazz up your wardrobe during sorties!

Upon purchasing this content, Attire "Yamato (Student Uniform)" will become
available to use in Megaton Musashi W: Wired.

Dress each pilot in their special outfits
in battle and a variety of other areas!

*Once purchased, you can change the Attire
for these characters from the Pilot & Cockpit
section of the Customization menu.
detailed_description:

section of the Customization menu.
